TopicTitle: In time for 1.0. Took me long enough.

Articles.Content:
Hello all,

I've been here for a while, lurking on the threads since .20. 

I love all things space of course and since I found KSP well my time has been well used making rockets and crashing space planes into the tower...or well anywhere really. 

I've seen great mods, great moderators, epic videos and learned a lot. So I'll thank you all for that, teaching me how to land on the mun, jeeze that was nerve wracking. By far this is the best community I've ever seen and and as such I'm super happy to be here finally. Its been a long time since I've posted in any forum but this one, well I don't even need to say why, its obvious. 

So onwards to HYPE and 1.0!!

L.G
Welcome aboard! Munar landings sure can take the mickey out of you to begin with, but in no time they become fun to do.
Orbital Rendezvous and Mun Landings are two of the most difficult things you can do in KSP, IMO. Once you get those down, the solar system is your oyster!
I mine that stuff down-Karbonite!! honestly docking is the hardest thing but its also the most fun. Making space stations bit by bit is rewarding, especially if it is a MIR recreation.
